md:
giải nghĩa từ "selling" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

 selling (verb) 

* Meaning: to offer or provide something in exchange for payment; to persuade someone to buy something.
* Type: verb
* Vietnamese: bán, chào hàng, quảng cáo

Example sentences:

* The company is selling its products online. (Công ty đang bán sản phẩm của mình trên mạng.)
* The salesperson is good at selling the new smartphone. (Nhân viên bán hàng giỏi bán điện thoại thông minh mới.)

Related words:

* sale (noun) - a period of time when goods are sold at a lower price than usual.
* seller (noun) - a person or company that sells something.
* sales (noun) - the amount of money that a company gets from selling its products or services.
* sellout (noun) - an event or situation in which all the tickets or products are sold.

Note: The word "selling" can also be used in other contexts, such as selling an idea or selling oneself, but the above definition and examples are the most common usage.
